text: in general how useful do you guys find things like schema or data model diagrams?
i’m doing some work around guest mode, and part of my process is going to be getting a good hold on how users relate to other data in the system, so i’ll probably make some sketches for myself
but if it’s a thing people could find useful i can try to formalize more

If they represent the real underlying data model and db structure, I find them very useful. If they’re used more as a tool to communicate in general how the app works, then I find them moderately useful. So… yeah, useful.
okay yeah what i’m talking about at the moment would definitely be the former, but it’s good to know both can be useful
